container.search.tooltip_header: Search for items whose names contain the text in the search field. You can also use the following operators:
container.search.tooltip_@: @: Search for items with the specified mod ID
container.search.tooltip_#: #: Search for items with the specified text in their tooltips
container.search.tooltip_$: $: Search for items in the specified block and/or item tag
container.search.tooltip_%: %: Search for items in the specified creative mode tab
container.search.tooltip_&: &: Search for items with the specified item ID
container.search.tooltip_-: -: Negate the following search (can be used with another operator)
